relationships.description: Zubair is seeking investment from Jeffrey for InsightsPod business venture
Zubair appears to be involved with InsightsPod and is presenting business plan

analysis.purpose: To provide election analysis data and seek investment/business backing for InsightsPod venture
analysis.significance: Shows business relationship and data analysis activities related to 2016 US presidential election

notable_quotes: Trump is definitely winning popular vote so far. According to our data winning chances of Trump are 52% in Electoral college.
Since Twitter is live streaming the presidential debates, the social media activity will accelerate and it will help us in making better predictions of outcome.
I hope you can help us by backing this venture.
red_flags: Repeated confidentiality disclaimers from JEE entity

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found - appears to be standard business communication

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed - communication is about election data analysis and business investment

details: References to Twitter live streaming presidential debates
Mentions processing 3 million tweets for election analysis

public_knowledge.context: 2016 US presidential election analysis was widely covered by media; business investment discussions are typically private

analysis.summary: Email chain between Zubair Khan and Jeffrey E. discussing 2016 US presidential election data analysis through InsightsPod, with Zubair seeking business investment backing for the venture based on their social media data processing capabilities.
